about.headline: Missing one task on site easily costs an extra NT$3000 day-rate. If materials are wasted it hurts even more — those misses become pure overhead.

experence.title: Give interior teams a clear, calm record of every job site
experence.description: From capturing updates to sharing them instantly, every milestone stays transparent so the whole crew reacts fast.

testimonials.quote: I can prioritize each site in minutes — it's like having a personal assistant.
testimonials.author: Project Manager

testimonials.quote: Since adopting the notebook, inspections and records stay in sync.
testimonials.author: Interior Designer

feature.title: Plan smoothly, execute faster
feature.subtitle: Three core tools keep every construction site in sync

services.title: Drag-and-drop tasks
services.description: Rearrange tasks freely so the plan always matches the job site reality

services.title: Markup on floor plans
services.description: Pin to-dos directly on drawings so every detail pairs visuals with text

services.title: Calendar by site
services.description: Multiple projects and crews stay organized with a shared timeline

construction.headline: "KaiJi Notebook" keeps every site task documented so progress flows and budgets stay on track.

visual.description: Greater accuracy means less rework so progress and budgets stay steady.
